name: Silvera, Witchwolf of the White Woods
text:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Special Summoned: You can change all face-up monsters your opponent controls to face-down Defense Position. Illusion and Spellcaster Synchro Monsters you control gain 500 ATK, also, if they attack a Defense Position monster, inflict doubled piercing battle damage to your opponent.
